remarks:
Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.)  Allow a shortening of ~ dral1 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Mar-2018.) 

---

 Formula-building lemma for use with the Distinctor Reduction Theorem. Part of Theorem 9.4 of [Megill] p. 448 (p. 16 of preprint). (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2005.)
statement:
dral1.1 $e |- ( A. x x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
dral2 $p |- ( A. x x = y -> ( A. z ph <-> A. z ps ) ) $.
